93 typedef union _Blocked_Operation_Modes_t
94 {
95  struct {
96  uint32_t rsvd_0 : 1; // [0], always 0
97  uint32_t disableUnsigned : 1; // [1]
98  uint32_t disableVendor : 1; // [2]
99  uint32_t disableMsft : 1; // [3]
100  uint32_t rsvd_31_4 : 28; // [31:4]
101  };
102  uint32_t u;
103 } Blocked_Operation_Modes_t;
